items.sentence: She succeeded in getting him to tell the truth.

What\'s the most popular sport in your country?
Tom didn\'t miss his umbrella till he got home.
Tom hasn\'t complained about anything recently.
Tom hasn\'t eaten a decent meal in a long time.
I haven\'t read the book you\'re talking about.
Tom asked Mary why she didn\'t want to do that.
Tom said that he never expected that to happen.

Tom said that he wanted to become a pharmacist.
Tom said you were in Australia for three years.
Tom sat alone with a half-empty bottle of wine.

There usually isn\'t much traffic on this road.

I want to dance at my granddaughter\'s wedding.
You\'re going to have to quit skipping classes.
You\'re likely the only person who can do that.
